categories.name: Medieval Perfumes
categories.description: Exquisite fragrances crafted with ancient techniques

categories.name: Antique Liquid Pens
categories.description: Vintage writing instruments from noble collections

categories.name: Silver Cartridge Containers

categories.name: Noble Family Furniture
categories.description: Authentic furniture pieces from aristocratic estates

products.name: Regal Essence - Medieval Rose
products.description: A luxurious perfume crafted with rare medieval roses, infused with amber and sandalwood. This exquisite fragrance was favored by queens and noble ladies of ancient courts.

products.name: Royal Jasmine Elixir
products.description: An intoxicating blend of jasmine, bergamot, and ancient spices used by medieval royalty. Each bottle is hand-blown and adorned with sterling silver.
features: Aged in oak barrels for 6 months

products.name: Noble's Amber Mystique
products.description: A mysterious fragrance with deep amber notes, vetiver, and precious oils. Once owned by the House of Montague, this recipe dates back to the 14th century.

products.name: Duchess Aurora Liquid Pen
products.description: An exquisite 18th-century liquid pen owned by Duchess Aurora. Crafted from sterling silver with intricate engravings and functional ink reservoir.

products.name: Lord Chamberlain's Cartridge Set
products.description: A magnificent set of silver cartridge containers from the estate of Lord Chamberlain. Each container features unique engravings and maintains its original luster.

products.name: Contessa's Writing Table
products.description: An authentic writing table from the 17th century, previously owned by Contessa Isabella. Features secret compartments and original brass fittings.
